Name: ハム★スピ！
About the game: Go your own way! !! There is no fixed path for this game! The way you want to go! An open world racing game where you can become a small hamster and run around freely. ~ Map ~ In the vast garden, there are many gimmicks and items such as 'Hidden Road' that can shortcut the dangerous 'crow' map that attacks the 'sunflower seed' hamster that exceeds the speed limit at once. ~ Online play ~ Up to 4 people can play online with friends and family! Aim for the goal faster than other players! ~ Hamster ~ There are 31 kinds of cute hamsters in total! Choose your favorite hamster!
